//this intro doesnt really need to be changed import thatme from '../assets/pilly.png' const Largecard = (props) => { return (

{props.status}

{props.title}

{props.description}

) } const statusStyle={ fontFamily: 'Karla', fontStyle: 'normal', fontWeight: 'normal', fontSize: '18px', color: 'black', } const titleStyle={ fontFamily: 'Rubik', fontStyle: 'normal', fontWeight: 'Bold', fontSize: '64px', color: 'black', } const descStyle={ fontFamily: 'Karla', fontStyle: 'normal', fontWeight: 'normal', fontSize: '24px', color: 'black', } export default Largecard
